data.contents: After creating an account in Instagram go to your Profile Click the bar icon in the top right of your profile account then go to Settings gt Account Scroll down to the bottom of the Account page and click Switch to Professional Account Following the steps to switch the account by clicking Continue button Figure 1 Instagram Account Setting Choose Categories of your business account as listed You can also switch on the categories into Display on Profile Figure 2 Business Account Categories Choose the business type whether a Business or a Creator Figure 3 Choose your business type Fulfill your business contact info contains email phone number and address address is optional The next step is to connect to your Facebook Page The Instagram system will automatically show the pop up of connecting to your Facebook You can click Continue or Login to Facebook from the first step Following the instructions by clicking Continue button Click the Add your Instagram account name button to add your Instagram business account to the Account Center Finish the setup of connecting to Account Center by clicking Yes Finish setup Choose your Facebook Page that wants to be connected to your Instagram business account or click Create a new Facebook Page If you click Create a new Facebook page you have to fill in the Page Name and Page Category The last step is to click the Create button after you fill in If your chose any Facebook Page in the list then you just need to click Next to finish the process Figure 4 Connect your facebook page Following the 4 steps to set up your professional account Complete your profile get inspired by following some related accounts grow your audience by inviting your relatives share 3 new contents to view insights and click to explore professional tools to see insights and promotions Figure 5 Professional Account Set Up After setting up your business account go to Settings gt Privacy gt Messages Scroll down to the bottom of the page and find Allow access to messages Switch on this to allow the access for any messages Figure 6 Message Controls Setting Login into and choose your page or account that has been connected in the sidebar After choosing the page for the first time you will automatically see the pop up to confirm Instagram access You need to login to your Instagram business account by clicking the Login button Then confirm to allow access to Instagram messages in Inbox After successfully set up your Instagram business account you can go back to Kata Omnichat to connect Instagram messaging as your channel in the dashboard
data.excerpt: After creating an account in Instagram go to your Profile
data.title: Prepare your Instagram Business account

data.contents: In the Getting Started page you have to click the Register in WhatsApp Business You will be directed to and have to follow all the steps for registering your WhatsApp Business number Learn more about registering your WhatsApp number After successfully registered your WhatsApp Business you can go back to Kata Omnichat to connect WABA as your channel in the dashboard
data.title: Prepare your WABA account

data.contents: Canned Responses are saved reply templates that can be used to quickly send out a reply to a conversation Both Agent and Administrator can add canned responses To add a canned response you need to follow these steps Go to Omnichat Homepage Click Setting gt Canned Responses on the sidebar Canned responses are used with the help of Short Codes Agents or admin can access canned responses while on a chat by typing followed by the shortcode Figure 61 Canned Responses Click canned response on the sidebar Figure 62 Canned Responses Set Up For creating a Canned Response just click on the Add Canned Response You can also edit or delete an existing Canned Response by clicking on the Edit or Delete button Figure 63 Add Canned Response Here are the details of the field in canned response Field Name Description Short Codes Shortcode that you will use to make a shortcut of your repeated answer for example list of product Content The answer message that will be sent to your customer for example Hi thank you for contacting us currently we sell Hamburger and fried fries
data.excerpt: Canned Responses are saved reply templates that can be used to quickly send out a reply to a conversation Both Agent and Administrator can add canned responses To add a canned response you need to follow these steps
data.title: Set up canned responses

data.contents: When youre logged in to the account the status by default will change online However If you want to change the status to Offline or Busy then you can click the change button on the below corner of the dashboard Figure 68 Change Status
data.excerpt: When youre logged in to the account the status by default will change online However If you want to change the status to Offline or Busy then you can click the change button on the below corner of the dashboard
data.title: How to use

data.contents: In this feature you can view the current status of your availability This status is reflected on other admin or agents when they want to assign you
data.excerpt: In this feature you can view the current status of your availability This status is reflected on other admin or agents when they want to assign you
data.title: Introduction

data.contents: To update your account setting you can follow these steps Go to Omnichat dashboard Click Setting on the sidebar Go to Account Setting on the sidebar Input the updated field Click the Update setting button on the top corner of the page After you click the update setting there will be a message Successfully updated account settings if the update is successful Figure 14 Setting Navigation bar Figure 15 General Account setting The available setting will be shown as below Field Name Description Account Name Enter the name of your Account For example PT YessBoss Indonesia Site Language Select the language in which conversations need to happen eg English en Select English if you want your conversations to be in English The number of days after a ticket should autoresolve if there is no activity Give the number of days after which the ticket or conversation will be marked as resolved eg 30 This is given in case the customer does not have any further queries but has not given closure also
data.excerpt: To update your account setting you can follow these steps
data.title: How to use

data.contents: Introduction Account setting is a general setting about the company that uses the account This page can be accessed only by administrators You can update your company name language and day ticket should autoresolve if there is no activity
data.excerpt: Account setting is a general setting about the company that uses the account This page can be accessed only by administrators You can update your company name language and day ticket should autoresolve if there is no activity
data.title: Configure your account

data.contents: For this tutorial go to Create Simple Handover from Chatbot to Agent Tutorial
data.excerpt: For this tutorial go to Create Simple Handover from Chatbot to Agent Tutorial
data.title: Create Agent Bot from Kata Platform

data.contents: Agent bot is a feature to integrate your Kata Platform chatbot with Omnichat as agent This feature will let you see the conversation stream between bot and endusers and take over conversation from bot when needed Learn more about creating a chatbot handover to an agent Setup Agent Bot in Kata Omnichat Go to the Settings menu in Omnichat Then click on the Integrations menu You will see 2 cards Agent bot and Webhooks Click the Configure button in Agent bot card Click Add new configuration to set up a new agent bot Fill in the agent bot name and description then choose inboxes that youve created before You can add multiple inboxes in 1 agent bot setup Finally youre ready to finalize the first step by clicking the generate access token button You must paste the access token into Platform Go to create simple chatbot handover tutorial to continue Figure 10 Bot Generate Access Token
data.excerpt: Agent bot is a feature to integrate your Kata Platform chatbot with Omnichat as agent This feature will let you see the conversation stream between bot and endusers and take over conversation from bot when needed Learn more about creating a chatbot handover to an agent
data.title: Configure your agent bot

data.contents: To enable audio notifications you need to follow these steps Login account Click on 3 kebab menu icons in the left under the corner of your dashboard besides your name Click profile setting then you will be directed to the page where you can get the setting for audio notifications Figure 67 Enable Audio Notifications Setting
data.excerpt: To enable audio notifications you need to follow these steps
data.title: How to use

data.contents: In this section you can set up your audio notification This can be set up by admin or agents By ticking Enable audio notifications it means you are agreeing to play audio notifications when a new conversation is created or new messages arrive
data.excerpt: In this section you can set up your audio notification This can be set up by admin or agents By ticking Enable audio notifications it means you are agreeing to play audio notifications when a new conversation is created or new messages arrive
data.title: Introduction

data.contents: Login account Click on 3 kebab menu icons in the left under the corner of your dashboard besides your name Click profile setting then you will be directed to the page where you can get access token Figure 66 Get Access Token
data.excerpt: Login account
data.title: How to use

data.contents: This token can be used if you are building an APIbased integration This can be accessed by admin and agents
data.excerpt: This token can be used if you are building an APIbased integration This can be accessed by admin and agents
data.title: Introduction

data.contents: In the Getting Started page you have to click the Connect button in Instagram Messaging Or you can go to Inboxes menu click Add new inbox button and click Instagram channel You will see the Get Started page of Instagram Messaging and follow all the steps including answering some integration questions and mini survey The system will automatically check the eligibility of your Instagram accounts If its eligible you will get a success message and if its not eligible you will be declined to use Instagram Messaging in Kata Omnichat Figure 7 Connect Instagram Inbox
data.excerpt: In the Getting Started page you have to click the Connect button in Instagram Messaging Or you can go to Inboxes menu click Add new inbox button and click Instagram channel
data.title: Connect your Instagram Messaging inbox

data.contents: In the Getting Started page you have to click the Connect button in WhatsApp Business API Or you can go to Inboxes menu click Add new inbox button and click WhatsApp Business API channel You will see the Get Started page of WhatsApp Channel then you have to create the Inbox Name and fill in the username and password from your WABAs API credentials You have to open your Business Dashboard account gt WhatsApp details and then copy username and password from API credentials Paste the username and password to Kata Omnichat then the system will automatically generate the webhook URL Lastly copy the Webhook URL that has been generated paste it into WhatsApp Details gt Webhook URL in Business Dashboard Figure 8 Webhook URL for whatsapp business dashboard account Figure 9 Integrate webhook Omnichat in Business Dashboard
data.excerpt: In the Getting Started page you have to click the Connect button in WhatsApp Business API Or you can go to Inboxes menu click Add new inbox button and click WhatsApp Business API channel
data.title: Connect your WABA inbox

data.contents: Go to and click Create New Account After that fill in your Work email and Password After clicking the Create account button youll be directed to the Onboarding page You have to fill in some information related to your business and your personal details After youve done the Onboarding process youll be directed to the Getting Started page with an unverified account To verify your account you have to check your email the verification link is automatically sent to your email or click the Verify account banner on top of your screen to resend an email verification After you click the verification button in email you will go back to the Getting Started page with an activated account You will also receive a product tutorial link in your email
data.title: Register your account first

data.contents: Changing password is the feature where agents and administrators can change their passwords for the first time after being invited via email Here are the steps to change the password after being invited Go to the email invitation then click Verify Account then you will be directed to Omnichat that has been logged in Go to Profile Settings in the bottom left corner Input current password that is stated in the email verification Set your new password Click the Update Profile button Figure 13 Change Password Changing passwords helps you to maintain your profile security by regularly changing your password If you Note Password must contain at least one uppercase character AZ at least one numeric character 09 at least one special character amp_ltgt
data.excerpt: Changing password is the feature where agents and administrators can change their passwords for the first time after being invited via email Here are the steps to change the password after being invited
data.title: Change password

data.contents: Configure your profile Kata Omnichat allows both admin and agents to set up your profile by changing display picture name and changing password It is easier to identify an account in the team To set up your profile you can follow these steps Login to your account Click on 3 kebab menu icons in the left under the corner of your dashboard besides your name Click Profile Setting You will be directed to the page where you can set up your profile Figure 11 Profile Setting Update profile On this page Omnichat provides the place for the admin and agent to update the profile to make it easier to identify in the team Figure 12 Update profile These are the fields to update your profile Field Name Description Profile image A square image that suits your profile If no image is provided then the system would take Gravatar Image if available Full name Provide your full name eg John Hopkins Display Name Provide a name that you want to be displayed on the chatemails eg John H Your email address This email address will be used to send notifications you will be using this email address to log in to Omnichat Note After you update your email you will be automatically logged out and you need to log in with the updated email with the same password After clicking the Update profile button then your update will be reflected immediately If the changes are successful you will see a message Your profile has been updated successfully
data.excerpt: Configure your profile
data.title: How to use the dashboard

data.contents: With Kata Omnichat you can easily manage distribute and review your agents performance providing you better insights on your customer service department You can also integrate chatbots to Kata Omnichat allowing your customer service agents to work handinhand with machine intelligence Its an allin one solution for your customer service department
data.excerpt: With Kata Omnichat you can easily manage distribute and review your agents performance providing you better insights on your customer service department You can also integrate chatbots to Kata Omnichat allowing your customer service agents to work handinhand with machine intelligence Its an allin one solution for your customer service department
data.title: Benefits with Kata Omnichat

data.contents: What is Kata Omnichat Kata Omnichat is a centralized dashboard where you can handle messages from multiple channels For now you can integrate 2 channels Instagram Messaging and WhatsApp Business API
data.excerpt: Kata Omnichat is a centralized dashboard where you can handle messages from multiple channels For now you can integrate 2 channels Instagram Messaging and WhatsApp Business API

data.contents: An agent is a member of your Customer Support team Agents will be able to view and reply to messages from your users Follow these steps to set up your agent Go to Home then click Settings Click Agents then click Add Agents button to add a new agent Figure 29 Manage Agent Add Agent Name Email and Role then click Add Agent to send an invitation to your agent Once your agents accept the invitation by setting up the password they can start to explore the dashboard Figure 30 Add Agent via Email When you are in step 3 you need to enter the agent information as shown below Field Name Description Agent Name Enter the name of your agent or additional admin For example Katherine Wong Role The role of the person you invited to You can choose the person that you assign as an agent or administrator If Agent Agents with this role can only access inboxes reports and conversations They can assign conversations to other agents or themselves and resolve conversations If Administrator Administrator will have access to all Kata Omnichat features enabled for your account including settings along with all of a normal agents privileges Email Address Add the Email address of the person youve invited to join When adding agents and administrators there are 2 status Pending Verification that means the email invitation has been sent to the invited one Action is needed from the invited agent or administrator to confirm the invitation Verified that means the invited agent and administrator has confirmed the invitation then they can explore the dashboard
data.excerpt: An agent is a member of your Customer Support team Agents will be able to view and reply to messages from your users Follow these steps to set up your agent
data.title: Add agent

data.contents: In this section you can delete the agent that is not used anymore To delete agents follow these steps Go to Home then click Settings Click delete on the right side of the agent name Click confirm to delete Then if successful the Agent deleted successfully message will be appeared Figure 33 Delete Agent
data.excerpt: In this section you can delete the agent that is not used anymore To delete agents follow these steps
data.title: Delete agent

data.contents: As an administrator you can edit your agents for the name and the role When you edit the role your agents can access the features as their role Follow these steps to edit your agent Go to Home then click Settings Figure 31 Agents Setting Click Edit on the right of the agent name Enter the name and the role you want to assign Click the Edit Agent button then if successful Agent update successfully will be appeared Figure 32 Edit Agents If you change the role then they will directly get access to the feature as their role For example edit role from agent to admin then the agent will get access to all the features that admin have
data.excerpt: When you edit the role your agents can access the features as their role Follow these steps to edit your agent
data.title: Edit agent

data.contents: If youre the agent or administrator who gets the invitation you need to confirm yourself in the email and get access to the dashboard youve been invited to Go to your email Check the email with the heading You have been invited from Kata Omnichat Figure 34 Receive invitation as an Agents Click on the confirmation link Be aware that there is the default password that you need to change after login successfully You can explore Kata Omnichat features and dont forget to change your password Figure 35 Getting Started Screen
data.excerpt: If youre the agent or administrator who gets the invitation you need to confirm yourself in the email and get access to the dashboard youve been invited to
data.title: Received the invitation as administrator or agent

data.contents: After creating the inbox you can configure your inbox setting as the feature provided in Kata Omnichat This setting can be accessed by admin only To access the Inbox Setting you must follow the steps below You can click Inboxes on the side bar or you can click setting on the sidebar then click Inboxes After clicking Inboxes you will be directed to the Inboxes Settings page Choose the inbox you want to configure by clicking on the Settings button Figure 22 Inbox Setting Field Name Description Inbox Name Enter the name of your Inbox Inbox name can be up to 50 characters For example Keatchen Inc IG Enable Channel Greeting Channel greetings provide the automatic answer as a greeting when the very first time enduser starts the conversation Choose your need If enabled then you need to enter the greeting message If disabled then there is no greeting answer in your channel Enable auto assignment Enable or disable the automatic assignment of new conversations to the agents added to this inbox There are some additional setting features in the inbox setting depending on your channel used for your inbox The list of features are shown as below Feature Is Available for IGDM Is Available for WABA Collaborators Yes Yes Quick Reply Yes No Set up Business Hours Yes Yes Ice Breaker Yes No IGDM Instagram Direct Message WABA Whatsapp Business Dashboard Manage agents to inbox In the collaborators section you can assign an agent to your inbox or delete existing agents who have been already assigned Follow these steps to add agent Click on the Collaborators tap in Inbox Setting Choose the agent that you want to assign or click X to delete the existing agents Click update then if successful _Agent updated successfully_ message will be appeared Figure 23 Manage agent to inbox
data.excerpt: After creating the inbox you can configure your inbox setting as the feature provided in Kata Omnichat This setting can be accessed by admin only To access the Inbox Setting you must follow the steps below
data.title: Manage inbox setting

data.contents: In this section You can set your business availability that will show the available hours on the live chat widget even if all the agents are offline Outside available hours visitors can be warned with a message and a prechat form The steps to set up business hours are shown as below Click on the Business Hours tap in Inbox Setting Tick on Enable business availability for this inbox then all business hours settings will be appeared Enter your Unavailable message for visitors then this message will automatically be sent to your customer when they start the conversation at the out of business hours The message can be up to 1000 messages Select your time zone Set up your business hours every day If your business is unavailable all day you can just untick the selected day then you are recorded as unavailable all day Click on the update business hours button If successful then the _Inbox setting updated successfully_ message will be appeared Figure 26 Business Hour Set Up The final result of the business hour set up is shown below Figure 27 Business Hour Result
data.excerpt: In this section You can set your business availability that will show the available hours on the live chat widget even if all the agents are offline Outside available hours visitors can be warned with a message and a prechat form The steps to set up business hours are shown as below
data.title: Set up business hours

data.contents: Ice Breakers section provides a way for very first time endusers to start a conversation with a business with a list of frequently asked questions The steps to set up Ice breaker are shown as below Click on the Ice Breaker tap in Inbox Setting Enter the frequently asked question Click Add New Ice Breaker Ice breaker added to your list up to 4 messages Figure 28 Ice Breaker Set Up
data.excerpt: Ice Breakers section provides a way for very first time endusers to start a conversation with a business with a list of frequently asked questions The steps to set up Ice breaker are shown as below
data.title: Set Up Ice Breaker

data.contents: The quick replies is the feature that you can manage any Quick Reply that they want to show to their customers using a buttontype reply In one quick reply you can input up to 13 quick answers Follow these steps to set up your quick reply Go to home page Go to Inbox on the sidebar Choose Instagram Messaging channel setting Click Quick reply tap Click Add New Quick reply Enter the quick reply name and contents details Remember that in 1 quick reply you can have 13 contents so make sure you click Enter after inputting the content Figure 24 Set up quick reply Submit the content Then to take a look at how quick reply go to the conversation Click quick reply on the text box choose the quick reply you want to use Text something first to your customer then the content will come after type any text Figure 25 Quick reply result
data.excerpt: The quick replies is the feature that you can manage any Quick Reply that they want to show to their customers using a buttontype reply In one quick reply you can input up to 13 quick answers Follow these steps to set up your quick reply
data.title: Setup quick reply

data.contents: The last step before completing the inbox is to add your agents You can add agents that have been invited and verified Or if you dont have any agents yet you can just add admin first and add another agent later Figure 20 Add Agents Lastly your inbox has been created and you can check from the sidebar in the Inboxes submenu
data.excerpt: The last step before completing the inbox is to add your agents You can add agents that have been invited and verified Or if you dont have any agents yet you can just add admin first and add another agent later
data.title: Add agents

data.contents: Inbox is the feature where you can connect your messaging channels to your Kata Omnichat account Currently Kata Omnichat provides 2 kinds of inboxes which are Whatsapp Business and Instagram Messaging Figure 16 Manage Inbox Note 1 account can connect to more than 1 Whatsapp Business API account or more than 1 Instagram MessagingAdd inbox There are 3 ways to add an inbox in Omnichat These are the steps to add an inbox as below The first way is when you onboard your account In this way you can see details here The second way is from the sidebar of your account dashboard Click on the plus icon then you will be directed to the Add Inboxes page Figure 17 Add Inbox The Third way is explained below Click Setting in the sidebar Click Inboxes in the sidebar then you will be directed to the Inboxes screen Click Add Inbox button in the upper right corner then you will be directed to Add Inboxes page Figure 18 Inboxes Screen After being directed to the Add Inboxes page then you need to follow the instruction before completing adding the inboxes In this step after you found the first step to add or create an inbox you need to authenticate your account based on the selected channel Learn more about connecting with Instagram Direct messages here and Whatsapp Business API here Then after successfully connecting your Instagram account or Whatsapp Business API you will be able to give a name to your inbox Click the Create inbox button then you will be directed to the next step Figure 19 Create Inbox
data.excerpt: Inbox is the feature where you can connect your messaging channels to your Kata Omnichat account Currently Kata Omnichat provides 2 kinds of inboxes which are Whatsapp Business and Instagram Messaging
data.title: Manage inbox

data.contents: After setting up your label then both Admin and agent can use the label to group the conversation into the label by adding the selected conversation into the label To add the conversion to the label you need to follow these steps Go to the conversation page then select the conversation you want to label Click more details under the name of your customer Then the right sidebar will appear Figure 54 More Details in Conversation Go to conversation labels then click add labels Choose the label you want and you can choose more than one label for a conversation Figure 55 Add Conversation to label After finishing adding your label Then go to the label on the left sidebar Check if the conversation has been added to the label Figure 56 Label Result
data.excerpt: After setting up your label then both Admin and agent can use the label to group the conversation into the label by adding the selected conversation into the label To add the conversion to the label you need to follow these steps
data.title: Add conversation to a label

data.contents: Labels help you to categorize conversations and prioritize them You can assign a label to a conversation from the side panel Labels are tied to the account and can be used to create custom workflows in your organization You can assign custom colors to a label it makes it easier to identify the label You will be able to display the label on the sidebar to filter the conversations easily Labels can be added by administrator only while agents can participate in adding conversation into a label Figure 52 Manage Label Add label In this section you can add edit and delete your label To add a label you can follow these steps Go to the Homepage Click the Labels menu on the sidebar or you can click setting on the sidebar then click Labels You will be directed to the Labels page Click add label to add the new label on the upper right corner or you can edit and delete the label by clicking the icons beside agent description The added label popup will appear and you need to enter the label name description and the color of the tag as your label Figure 53 Add label Here are the field descriptions related to label management Field Name Description Label name Enter the name of the label The validation of label name is only Alphabets Numbers Hyphen and Underscore are allowed For example Spam Description Enter the description of the label name for example Spam is for the repeated message with no indentation Colour Choose the color you want to be the identifier of the label This color will be reflected on the sidebar and your conversation Show label on the sidebar If you tick the label on the sidebar the label will show up on your sidebarIf you untick then the label will not show up on your sidebar
data.excerpt: Labels help you to categorize conversations and prioritize them You can assign a label to a conversation from the side panel Labels are tied to the account and can be used to create custom workflows in your organization You can assign custom colors to a label it makes it easier to identify the label You will be able to display the label on the sidebar to filter the conversations easily Labels can be added by administrator only while agents can participate in adding conversation into a label
data.title: Manage label

data.contents: Teams let you organize your agents into groups based on their responsibilities A user can be part of multiple teams You can assign conversations to a team when you are working collaboratively This feature can be set up by administrators only You can go to Settings gt teams to manage your teams Add Teams As Admin you can follow these steps to create a new team Go to the home page then click the setting button on the sidebar Click Teams in the sidebar Figure 57 Manage Team Click Create a new team in the upper right corner Then create a new team page will be appeared Figure 58 Create New Team There will be 3 milestones to finish the team addition Create Add Agent and Finish Enter the team name and team description then click create a team Choose the agent you want to assign to the team You can assign to more than 1 agent Then click add agent Figure 59 Add Agent to the team Then if its successful your team is ready to appear on the screen Figure 60 Team Ready
data.excerpt: Teams let you organize your agents into groups based on their responsibilities
data.title: Manage Teams

data.contents: Besides getting contact from interaction you can add a contact by yourself Go to Omnichat homepage Click Contact on the sidebar Click the Add Contact button on the upper right corner Enter the contact details as the form that has been provided by Omnichat Figure 51 Add Contact The list of contact information is shown below Field Name Description Full Name Enter the full name of your for example Katherine Wong Email Address Enter Your contact email address for example katherinewonggmailcom Bio Enter the brief biodata of your contact Phone Number Enter the phone number of your contact Company Name Enter the company your contact works for Social Profile Choose the social profile you want to choose and give the link There are 3 types of social media which are Facebook Twitter and LinkedIn
data.excerpt: Besides getting contact from interaction you can add a contact by yourself
data.title: Add contact

data.contents: TThe contacts section in Omnichat contains the details of end userscustomers that you have interacted with You can consider it as a Customer Database Follow these steps to go to contact Go to Omnichat homepage Click Contact on the sidebar You can see the list of names and contact information of your customers that had interaction with your channel Figure 50 Manage Contact There is a lot of information from the customer we can get the information that can be detected is only public information which means any private information can not be reflected
data.excerpt: TThe contacts section in Omnichat contains the details of end userscustomers that you have interacted with You can consider it as a Customer Database Follow these steps to go to contact
data.title: View contact

data.contents: Every conversation in Kata Omnichat can belong to at least one assigned agent There is a case to assign the conversation either manually or automatically Admin can assign to the bot agent another admin or the system will assign them automatically In another case an agent can assign to another agent In this documentation you can learn how to manage your conversation from the incoming message into the resolved message In Kata Omnichat There will be 3 kinds of conversations Open resolve and bot conversation Open The conversation that has not been resolved by agent yet Resolved The conversation that has been resolved Learn more about resolving messages here Bot The conversation that is handled by the bot and can be takeover by agent anytime Admin view conversation As admin you will see all incoming conversations to your inboxes In the conversation box you will see 3 options in the tab Mine Unassigned and All Learn more about these as below Unassigned The first incoming message will go to unassigned conversation This will help admin to identify which conversation needs to be assigned Admin needs to assign an online agent to move the conversation from unassigned Learn more to assign to your agent here Mine The incoming conversation that has already been assigned to me as an agent This will help the admin to identify which chat needs to handle All All conversations will be recorded in the All tab both assigned or unassigned Figure 36 Admin View Conversation
data.excerpt: Every conversation in Kata Omnichat can belong to at least one assigned agent There is a case to assign the conversation either manually or automatically Admin can assign to the bot agent another admin or the system will assign them automatically In another case an agent can assign to another agent In this documentation you can learn how to manage your conversation from the incoming message into the resolved message
data.title: Manage your conversation

data.contents: As an agent you will see the conversations that were assigned to you both manual assignment or autoassignment In the conversation box you will see 2 options in tab Mine and Unassigned Learn more about these below Unassigned The first incoming message that is not assigned to you This will help the agent to identify which conversation is not awarded by agents Mine The incoming conversation that has already been assigned to me This will help the admin to identify which chat needs to handle Figure 37 Agent View Conversation
data.excerpt: As an agent you will see the conversations that were assigned to you both manual assignment or autoassignment In the conversation box you will see 2 options in tab Mine and Unassigned Learn more about these below
data.title: Agent view conversation

data.contents: Omnichat provides a roundrobin autoassignment system for conversations The assignment follows the logic mentioned below Note Round robin assignment is enabled by default If there are agents online who have access to the inbox in which a conversation is created the system would distribute the conversations equally among the online agents If all the agents are offline the system would distribute the conversations equally to all agents Figure 44 Auto Agent Assignment To enable roundrobin assignment in your inbox follow the steps below Go to Settings gt Inboxes Click on the inbox settings link of the inbox you want to enable roundrobin assignment Scroll down to see the setting for Roundrobin as shown below
data.excerpt: Omnichat provides a roundrobin autoassignment system for conversations The assignment follows the logic mentioned below
data.title: Auto agent assignment

data.contents: Customers send messages to the Instagram account Also customers can reply to the brands Instagram Story Instagram Story Reply or mention the brands Instagram account in the customers Instagram Story Instagram Story Mention Disclaimer Customers Instagram account must be public if they want to send Instagram Story Reply and Instagram Story Mention to a brand otherwise it cannot be replied by bot If customers accounts are private then the brand must request to follow the customers first Figure 40 Conversation in Customerside using bot If the conversation is new customers can select Ice Breaker topics or directly type a message If the conversation is not new customers can directly send any messages Customers will be offered to choose whether they want to be handovered to agents or not If they choose yes then there will be an agent assigned for them Customers will receive Instagram automation various responses such as text image carousel generic template quick replies and heart sticker when liking a message coming soon Learn more about how to use Instagram DM automation During chatbotcustomer conversation agents can take over the conversation if users add an agent bot in the Inbox Learn more about set up agent bot in Omnichat Customers can send and receive messages until agents resolve the conversation if they choose to be handovered or end the conversation with chatbot
data.excerpt: Customers send messages to the Instagram account
data.title: Conversation in Customer-side using bot

data.contents: Customers send messages to the Instagram account Also customers can reply to the brands Instagram Story Instagram Story Reply or mention the brands Instagram account in the customers Instagram Story Instagram Story Mention Disclaimer Customers Instagram accounts must be public if they want to send Instagram Story Reply and Instagram Story Mention to a brand otherwise it cannot be replied by bot If customers accounts are private then the brand must request to follow the customers first If its a new conversation and youve already set up the Ice Breaker customers will see the conversation topics If the conversation isnt new or you havent set up the Ice Breaker customers can directly send any messages Customers can send text image video story mention and inline liking Agents can send text image video and inline liking Customers can have conversations with agents until agents resolve it
data.excerpt: Customers send messages to the Instagram account
data.title: Conversation in Customer-side for Instagram Messaging (without bot)

data.contents: In the conversation there is a feature that Omnichat provides where you can download transcripts of the conversation You can see the download menu as shown below Go to conversation Click the kebab icon in the upper right corner of the conversation Choose the send conversation transcript There will appear a popup to ask for your email address The transcript will be sent to this email address Figure 49 Download Conversation Transcript
data.excerpt: In the conversation there is a feature that Omnichat provides where you can download transcripts of the conversation You can see the download menu as shown below
data.title: Download transcript

data.contents: Every conversation in Omnichat can have an assignee An assignee can be manually added to the conversation or the organizations can opt for a roundrobin assignment system A conversation can be manually assigned to 2 categories of users Agents who have access to the inbox in which the conversation is created Administrators who can access every conversation in the system To assign an agent or admin to a conversation an adminagent can select the assignee from the dropdown named under Assigned Agent from the Conversation Details section in the right sidebar as shown below Figure 43 Agent Assignment Besides that as an agent you can assign conversation to another agent or administration by following the same steps above
data.excerpt: Every conversation in Omnichat can have an assignee An assignee can be manually added to the conversation or the organizations can opt for a roundrobin assignment system A conversation can be manually assigned to 2 categories of users
data.title: Manual Agent Assignment

data.contents: In Kata Omnichat both admin and agents can manage the conversation to mute the conversation The mute conversation is the feature when you cant see the conversation for 6 hours To set up this feature you can go to conversation then click the kebab icon in the upper right corner then choose mute conversation Figure 48 Mute Conversation
data.excerpt: In Kata Omnichat both admin and agents can manage the conversation to mute the conversation The mute conversation is the feature when you cant see the conversation for 6 hours
data.title: Mute conversation

data.contents: When completing the conversation you need to be notified that the conversation is resolved and another conversation needs to be rehandled Both agent and administrator can resolve conversations Go to conversation choose the selected conversation you want to resolved Click the resolved button on the upper right corner Note Make sure you change the agent name beside the resolve button to be none to make sure if there is any upcoming message from the same customer they will not go to the same agent Figure 45 Resolve Conversation The conversation will move from Mine to All and it will include in resolve message
data.excerpt: When completing the conversation you need to be notified that the conversation is resolved and another conversation needs to be rehandled Both agent and administrator can resolve conversations
data.title: Resolve conversation

data.contents: Go to the Conversation menu to see all your messages both new and past messages In this page you will see a dropdown which consists of Open Resolved Bot Open means all new messages and not responded yet by agents Resolved means all resolved messages from human agents Bot means all conversations between chatbot and endusers Choose Bot and see the ongoing conversation You will see purple messages which indicate responses from chatbot and white which indicate incoming messages from the enduser
data.title: See Conversation between Chatbot and Customer

data.contents: As an admin or agent you can see the conversation handled by the bot In this case if you see the bot not solving the problem you can use the Take over the bot You can see the bot here Go to the Conversation menu to see all your messages both new and past messages Choose Bot To take over the conversation click the Open button which is placed next in the agents list dropdown Figure 46 Takeover bot Conversation with chatbot is paused and you can type to reply to the enduser Your reply will be seen in the blue message Figure 47 Agent Takeover conversation
data.excerpt: As an admin or agent you can see the conversation handled by the bot In this case if you see the bot not solving the problem you can use the Take over the bot You can see the bot here
data.title: Take-over bot

data.contents: The private note is the feature for the admin and agent to communicate with each other based on the conversation The private note always sticks in the conversation box Go to the conversation then click the Private Note tap in the upper of the conversation box Then write some notes about the conversation then add notes Private notes will be included in the conversation but only admin and agent can see it customers cant see the notes Figure 41 Private Note Figure 42 Private Note Result
data.excerpt: The private note is the feature for the admin and agent to communicate with each other based on the conversation The private note always sticks in the conversation box Go to the conversation then click the Private Note tap in the upper of the conversation box Then write some notes about the conversation then add notes
data.title: Using private notes in conversations

data.contents: Customers started to chat to WABA number Customers can send to and receive messages from agents using these types of messages text image video and document Agents can directly reply to customers using text image video and document Or takeover the conversation first from agent bot before replying it Figure 39 Whatsapp Business API conversation in agentside
data.excerpt: Customers started to chat to WABA number
data.title: Whatsapp Business API conversation in agent-side (with or without bot)

data.contents: For the WABA API channel we can use the bot as our agent Learn about how the bot can start the conversation The customer started to chat to users WABA number During chatbot and customer conversation customers can request handover to agents or agents can take over the conversation if users add an agent bot in the inbox Learn more about setup agent bot in Omnichat Figure 38 Conversation with bot Customers can send and receive messages until agents resolve the conversation if they choose to be handover and the conversation will be handed off again to the agent bot or end the conversation with a chatbot
data.excerpt: For the WABA API channel we can use the bot as our agent Learn about how the bot can start the conversation
data.title: Whatsapp Business conversation using a bot

data.contents: On this page you can download the agent report by clicking the right upper corner of the page and you will see the report of the metrics group by the agents so you can have agent productivity data Figure 70 Download Report
data.excerpt: On this page you can download the agent report by clicking the right upper corner of the page and you will see the report of the metrics group by the agents so you can have agent productivity data
data.title: Download report

data.contents: The report shows the activity of your conversation from all channels or inboxes The report can be accessed only by the admin In the report you can view the report dashboard and download agent reports View report To view the report you need to click reports on the sidebar then you will be directed to the report On the reports dashboard you can see the metrics which are conversations count incoming message count outgoing message count first response time resolution time and resolution count You can also filter the report by period Figure 69 Report View Please find the related metrics of the reports Field Name Description conversations count How many conversations happened in the selected period including both incoming or outgoing message incoming message count How many messages coming from customer to business account in the selected period Outgoing message count How many messages came from business account to customer in the selected period First response time The average conversation time is being responded to for the first time Resolution time The average time of conversation is from being open to resolved by admin or agent Resolution count The number of conversation is from being open to resolved by admin or agent
data.excerpt: The report shows the activity of your conversation from all channels or inboxes The report can be accessed only by the admin In the report you can view the report dashboard and download agent reports
data.title: Reports

data.contents: You can follow these steps if you want to update your email notifications Login account Click on 3 kebab menu icons in the left under the corner of your dashboard besides your name Click profile setting You will be directed to the page where you can set up your email notification Figure 64 Profile Settings Tick the conversation you are interested in By ticking the preference means that you agree to send us the email notification by the case There 4 preferences of the email notification you want to set up When a new conversation is created When a conversation is assigned to me When youre mentioned in conversation When a new message is created in an assigned conversation Figure 65 Email Notification Setting
data.excerpt: You can follow these steps if you want to update your email notifications
data.title: How to use

data.contents: In this section you can set up your preference on email notifications Email notification settings can be accessed by Administrators and Agents
data.excerpt: In this section you can set up your preference on email notifications Email notification settings can be accessed by Administrators and Agents
data.title: Introduction
